review.comment: I'm over the moon with my non-surgical rhinoplasty. I was quite nervous but Hannah was amazing. She made me feel so at ease and relaxed. The procedure was a quick and smooth process and I'm beyond happy with the results, I feel so much more confident now! The service was high quality and professional yet so friendly, I highly recommend! Thank you so much Hannah
I am over the moon with my results! They have given me the best advice and wouldn’t let anybody get something they didn’t need etc. a very friendly and professional team I wouldnt go anywhere else !
Excellent service from start to finish. My hydrafacial was incredible and will definitely have it again.
The girls are so welcoming and friendly, Hannah provides a very professional service, she is very reassuring before/during/after the procedure. I wouldn’t go anywhere else!!!
Really good service, even when I went faint with needles Hannah was professional and lovely
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review! Haha you were absolutely fine babe! Hopefully see you soon!

review.comment: Hannah is the only person i will ever trust to do my treatments, she is the best at what she does and it shows! well worth travelling an hour and a half for 💖
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for a review! Your comments are lovely and mean so much to us! Hopefully see you again!

Had the best experience today with the girls, so welcoming. Had a previous bad experience so was really nervous and they put me at ease.
Thank you so much I’m so happy with my lips💕

review.comment:
Seen Hanna today filler and Botox can’t fault her she listens to what you want  and dose a great job I’m so happy with the filler results Botox kicking in already :)
Sophie is also great , definitely will be going back
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review! Hopefully see you soon!

review.comment: This is my 3rd time visiting the clinic and Sophie and Hannah were so friendly and welcoming. I absolutely love my lips once again! I can't wait for another treatment and I'd have no worries trying something new as Hannah is very professional and will provide honest advice 😊
review.review_reply: Was so lovely seeing you again, thank you so much for your review.

review.comment: Both Hannah and Sophie are very  professional and informative, always feel welcomed and relaxed. Over the moon with the results of my lips, even though they look huge right now 😆 can’t wait to see the end result! Thank you again 💖
review.review_reply: What a lovely review, thank you so much! Was lovely to see you and I hope the swelling has started to subside haha. See you soon x

review.comment:
This place is amazingly clean, it's modern, well up to date with all the tech side of things, the girls are so so friendly, and they are all walking, talking advertisements for their business!!
Everything was explained in layman's terms to me, they literally check your health, no faffing about, very professional.
I chose to have Botox on my forehead and some filler in my lower cheeks. You do feel a sharp scratch when the needle goes in at first, but it's not as bad as I thought it would be.
Every move is explained beforehand, and they make you feel at ease, knowing that whilst I had not a clue how this stuff worked, they were very experienced.
The filler worked straight away! I know I was told it would, but OMG! Keep checking the mirror to make sure I saw it right, and they've GONE! Awesome 😁😁
I go back in a fortnight, the Botox should kick in in around ten days. So I'll update my review once it does 😉😁😁 5* for me, well recommended xx
review.review_reply: What an amazing review to read! Thank you so much for taking the time to write this, it was lovely meeting you and we will see you again next week x

review.comment:
*petrified filler newbie here!*

I found Hannah & The Aesthetic Clinic via a friend, which has to be around 5/6 years ago now! I followed her instagram page back then and I’ve been obsessed with her work ever since, but always too scared to take the plunge!
After waiting YEARS to find the perfect person and build up the courage, I decided Hannah was 1000% the person I wanted to book in with for 1ml lip filler & 1 treatment of Sunekos under my eyes. And let me just say, I DID NOT regret it!

From the second I arrived, to the second I left, I felt so comfortable and at ease. Hannah (& Sophie) were so professional, reassuring and understanding I absolutely can not recommend them & The Aesthetic Clinic enough!
The procedures were done so quick and gentle, the pain turned out to be NOTHING close to what I had previously imagined! Hannah was so patient through out and often reminded me I could take a breather if needed. When I left, I received an after care bag which contained all the information you may need and even a lip cream, which was such a lovely touch!

Actually seeing my results with Hannah is what made me feel my long wait for filler was so, so, so worth it!!! I wanted the look of “has she had her lips done or not” I didn’t want them to be too noticeable, and I feel Hannah helped me achieve that look. Im so happy & i’m positive I chose the right clinic & I’m also convinced I couldn’t have chosen anyone else better for my first time. Hannah is amazing at what she does, I will only go to Hannah in the future now and I’ll only ever recommend The Aesthetic Clinic to others!

Whether you’re a filler newbie or not, you’ll definitely be in safe hands at The Aesthetic Clinic!🥰
review.review_reply: Cannot cope! What a lovely review, it's made our day. Thank you so much for firstly trusting us with doing your treatments and secondly leaving this amazing review. We can't wait to see you again x

review.comment:
Service is second to none!
As soon as you walk through the front door, Sophie is there to great you and put you at ease. The clinic is absolutely immaculate, well presented and has an amazing relaxed and private atmosphere.
Hannah is the best by far and is immediately calming and reassuring. She talked me through the procedure from beginning to end and continually checked if I was OK throughout.
The after care bag is the cutest touch and I wouldn't dream of going anywhere else!!
review.review_reply: Loved reading this review, thank you so much!  Love having you in the clinic see you soon

review.comment: Hannah and Sophie were both so lovely and welcoming and made sure we felt comfortable throughout. Hannah is amazing at what she does and makes sure your comfortable with it!! Would most definitely recommend xx
review.review_reply:
Thank you so so much for this review, it means so much!
So happy you felt comfortable with us and was lush having you in the clinic x

review.comment: I could not be more pleased with my results from visiting the aesthetic clinic, so much so, I’ve returned time and time again for various treatments. All staff are unbelievably professional and welcoming, really make you feel at ease. The clinic is absolutely spotless every time I visit. The consultations are never rushed and Hannah always takes her time to discuss everything I want to achieve to ensure the best results. I could not recommend the aesthetic clinic enough, I wouldn’t trust anyone else to do my procedures!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review! We can’t wait to see you again! ♥️

review.comment: I have been visiting the aesthetic clinic for years, Hannah is professional, friendly and always makes me feel welcome. I would never visit another place, everything that I have had done through the aesthetic clinic looks natural and Hannah and her team are the best around. 100% recommend visiting the salon in porthcawl for any of your beauty needs.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for a review! We love reading them! We hope to see you again soon! Xx

review.comment: It was my first time going to hannah, she is lovely and made me feel so comfortable during the whole experience. She done my lips just how i wanted them so natural looking but plump also! X
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for a review! We love reading them! We hope to see you again soon! Xx

review.comment:
I can’t recommend Hannah and the Aesthetic Clinic enough! I’v had lip filler previously by another practitioner but I wasn’t fully satisfied so I booked in with Hannah, and I will never ever look back! Not only was she so friendly and professional the whole time, but she completely transformed my lips! I told her what I was unhappy with and she did exactly what I wanted! previously it has been so painful and taken around 25-30 minutes for the procedure, but Hannah’s technique was brilliant I was totally amazed! Minimal pain and all over and done with in 10 minutes!
Sophie, her assistant/receptionist is an absolute babe  aswell she makes you feel really welcome when you arrive and you’re waiting... especially if it’s your first time and you’re nervous, both of the the girls will be so lovely to you.
Highly highly recommended and I’ll definitely be a customer for life!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review! It truly makes us feel good reading these :) can’t wait to see you again!

review.comment: Incredible results as always 😍 always amazing service and great prices. The best clinic ever 🙌🏽🙌🏽
review.review_reply: Thank you so much babe! Loved seeing you as always!

review.comment: First time going to the clinic, I was so nervous at first but I walked in and had a warm welcome and instantly felt at ease. So professional but still a comfortable experience. Hannah was lovely and talked me through everything as she was going and did a fantastic job.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review! It means so much to us :) these make us feel good! Hopefully see you soon!

review.comment: The best in the business! I will not trust anyone but Hannah. She puts you at ease and makes you feel so comfortable! Highly recommend to anyone looking for treatments!

review.comment: Hannah is so professional. My first time at the clinic was such a relaxing experience and Hannah was there to put my mind to rest and answer all questions I had so confidently. I would never go to anyone else!
